title: I can’t forget those days ... Fighting over little things, late night talks, sharing  secrets,  being...

attachments.displayName: I can’t forget those days ... Fighting over little things, late night talks, sharing  secrets,  being positive attitude, waiting for ur  text, watching ur pics n text over n over,  smiling over no reason. Trusting u blindly, ur hugs n ur kisses ur innocent wishes,  &  just having blank inbox,  no more i lv u,  hrs. of loneliness,  un shared emotion,  late night  cries..  hrtbrking secrets,  fake smiles,  broken  trust,  ur nailed hugs,  i don't know y,  Y i still  waiting for you
